name: The Flesh God
description: The Flesh God is a tough action platformer where you shoot a massive gun to fly through deadly levels infested with mutant flesh.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 460 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
